data.text: I think I explained my stance. And obviously I'm not perfect.. and I have a bit of mean streak. Unlike the women I'm complaining about, who came against me on this, I admit I have things I need to take care of, of my own, and strive to be balanced in looking for solutions.

The ONLY WAY to avoid mistakes & further damage in our world, one where women & men shld b treated equally, other then when it comes2the science of biology, is to work 2 solve these problems, while giving the oppressed sex strength & safety, but @ the same time b gender inclusive

Then could explain to me why someone would do such a thing all the while VOLUNTEERING at a women's shelter as the first line of contact. How many lives did she ruin? No one would question her or believe me because she ran some kind of game to get where she was at.Check yourselves

voice an opinion and as for a conversation, I feel just as they do when they called me different names and blocked me, then commented and shamed me for not blindly taking a women's side. IF only some of these ppl knew what the womens shelter worker said2me when I called for help

I'm a mother of 3 sons and 1 daughter. I've lived through abusive relationships. I've gone to a lot of counseling, I've supported a lot of people, men and women. Mostly women. So when I have people treat me the way these bloggers have when I have done nothing AT THAT POINT, other
